scripts.launch: npm run build:happ && npm run build:libs && npm run build:ui && WEBKIT_DISABLE_COMPOSITING_MODE=1 npm run launch:happ
scripts.launch:happ: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc launch --piped -n 2 workdir/syn-test.happ -w --ui-path apps/syntext/public network mdns
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run dev:libs" "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w syntext"
scripts.dev:libs: concurrently "npm run build:watch -w @holochain-syn/client" "npm run build:watch -w @holochain-syn/store" "npm run build:watch -w @holochain-syn/core" "npm run build:watch -w @holochain-syn/text-editor"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm run build:libs && npm test -w @holochain-syn/tests
scripts.start:happ: echo "pass" | hc s --piped generate -r=$HC_PORT workdir/syn-test.happ -a syn network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack workdir
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack workdir
